Why Windows VPS

The power of Windows, anywhere

Run your Windows workloads on enterprise hardware with full administrator access.

Full RDP Access

Connect via Remote Desktop with complete administrator privileges. Your Windows server, your rules.

.NET & ASP.NET Ready

Pre-configured for .NET Framework and .NET Core applications. IIS ready out of the box.

SQL Server Support

Run Microsoft SQL Server with enterprise-grade performance. Express edition included.

License Included

Windows Server license included in the price. No additional fees or BYOL hassles.

NVMe Performance

Enterprise NVMe storage for blazing-fast application performance and boot times.

Instant Deployment

Your Windows VPS is ready in under 3 minutes. Pre-configured and optimized.

FAQ

Windows VPS questions

Yes! You get complete administrator (root) access via Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP). Install any software, configure services, and manage your server exactly as you would a physical Windows machine.
Use the built-in Remote Desktop Connection on Windows, Microsoft Remote Desktop on Mac/iOS, or any RDP client on Linux/Android. We provide the IP address and credentials after deployment. Download our mobile app for on-the-go management.
Absolutely! Use IIS (Internet Information Services) to host multiple websites and applications on a single server. Perfect for agencies and developers. Learn more in our multi-site hosting guide.
Yes! Our iOS and Android apps let you manage, restart, and monitor your Windows VPS from anywhere. You can even connect via RDP apps directly from your phone. Download the app to get started.
If you need dedicated resources without virtualization overhead, consider our dedicated server hosting. Get bare-metal performance with the same great support.
